The device gives its wearer the ability to travel 57 seconds into the past, so Franklin decides to use it to take revenge against the pharmaceutical company responsible for his sister's death. programme.title: Transformers: Rise Of The Beasts
programme.sub-title: Action, Fantasy, War, Drama, Sci Fi ║ 2023 ║ 12A
programme.desc: In 1994 New York City, ex-serviceman Noah Diaz accepts a job from neighbourhood chancer Reek to steal a sports car. The high-end vehicle turns out to be robot-in-disguise Mirage, who propels Noah into the midst of a hunt for a precious Transwarp key. The device will allow Autobot leader Optimus Prime and his mechanised compatriots to return home to Cybertron. programme.title: Hypnotic
programme.sub-title: Mystery, Thriller, Drama, Action, Sci Fi ║ 2023 ║ 15
programme.desc: Police detective Danny Rourke is haunted by the abduction of his seven-year-old daughter Minnie from a park. Evidence leads to a psychic Diana Cruz, who introduces the cop to the unseen world of hypnotics - people with the ability to control how we perceive the world. programme.title: Dance First
programme.desc: In 1969 Stockholm, Samuel Beckett is due to receive the Nobel Prize for Literature at a ceremony attended by his wife Suzanne and dignitaries. programme.title: Live NCAA Basketball
programme.desc: NCAA men's college basketball action, as the Texas A&M Aggies host the Arkansas Razorbacks. (21.02).

programme.title: Ladies European Tour Golf Hlts
programme.desc: Tournament highlights from the the Aramco Saudi Ladies International Presented by PIF in Riyadh. Lydia Ko triumphed for the second time here in 2023.

programme.title: PGA Tour Golf Highlights
programme.desc: Tournament highlights from the Genesis Invitational - the third PGA Tour Signature Event of 2024 - at Riviera Country Club in California. Jon Rahm claimed victory here previously.

programme.title: PL Greatest: Norwich/M'boro 2005
programme.desc: A chance to relive a classic Premier League match. Here, Norwich City meet Middlesbrough at Carrow Road in 2005, with the Canaries making a stunning comeback.

programme.title: PL Greatest: Bolton v M'boro 2003
programme.desc: A chance to relive a classic Premier League match. Here, Bolton Wanderers fight for their top-flight survival against Middlesbrough on the final day of the 2002-03 season.

programme.title: PL Greatest Liverpool/Arsenal 2004
programme.desc: A chance to relive a classic Premier League match. Here, Liverpool take on Arsenal back in 2004 at Anfield in a match that saw some late, late drama.

programme.title: PL Greatest Games:Leics/Everton'16
programme.desc: Relive a classic Premier League match. Here, Leicester City celebrate their iconic Premier League title triumph in style as they host Everton at the King Power Stadium in May 2016.

programme.title: Fight Night Int: Foster v Nova
programme.desc: The Theater at Madison Square Garden sets the scene for a WBC super-featherweight title defence, as the champion O'Shaquie Foster goes toe to toe with Abraham Nova for 12 rounds. (17.02).

programme.title: Mexico Open 2022 Highlights
programme.desc: Highlights from the 2022 Mexico Open, taking place on the Greg Norman Signature Course in Vallarta. Brand new to the PGA Tour, this event made its official debut.

programme.title: Fight Night: Okolie v Billam-Smith
programme.desc: Travelling to the home of the challenger, Lawrence Okolie defends his WBO cruiserweight world title against Bournemouth's own Chris Billam-Smith at the Vitality Stadium. (27.05).

programme.title: BBL: Caledonia V Surrey
programme.desc: A British Basketball League encounter between the Caledonia Gladiators and the Surrey Scorchers. (15.02).

programme.title: ICC Men's T20 WC: ENG v NED 2009
programme.desc: Over the years, the ICC Men's T20 World Cup has thrown up a host of classic encounters. Here, revisit England's 2009 clash with the Netherlands.

programme.title: ICC Men's T20 WC: ENG v IND 2009
programme.desc: Over the years, the ICC Men's T20 World Cup has thrown up a host of classic encounters. Here, revisit England's 2009 clash with India at Lord's.

programme.title: Live African Amateur Championship
programme.desc: Day one of the 2024 African Amateur Championship, held at Leopard Creek, South Africa. Featuring 72 men, the winner here will receive exemption for The 152nd Open at Royal Troon. (21.02).

programme.title: ICC Women's CWC 2017: ENG v IND
programme.desc: The 2017 ICC Women's World Cup begins as England face India at the County Cricket Ground in Derby. The hosts will look for a good start here as they try to win the tournament on home soil.

programme.title: U.S. Open Golf Official Film 2018
programme.desc: The official film of the 2018 US Open, held at Shinnecock Hills Golf Course. On an exceptionally challenging course, Brooks Koepka was aiming to retain his title from 2017.

programme.title: Ladies European Tour Golf Hlts
programme.desc: Tournament highlights from the the Aramco Saudi Ladies International Presented by PIF in Riyadh. Lydia Ko triumphed for the second time here in 2023.

programme.title: F1 2023 Season Review
programme.desc: As another chapter in F1 closes, take a look back at 2023 with the Sky Sports F1 team.

programme.title: PL Legends: Van Nistelrooy
programme.desc: A profile of former Manchester United striker Ruud van Nistelrooy. The Dutchman scored 95 goals in 150 appearances for the Red Devils before moving to Real Madrid.

programme.title: PL Stories: Santi Carzola
programme.desc: Having spent six seasons in the Premier League with Arsenal, Santi Cazorla charts his incredible footballing journey. From FA Cup glory to triumph at EURO 2012, find out what made him tick.

programme.title: PL 100: Paul Scholes
programme.desc: In this episode of PL100, we sit down with ex-Manchester United midfielder Paul Scholes who scored 107 goals in 499 performances in the Premier League.

programme.title: Premier League Darts: Glasgow
programme.desc: The BetMGM Premier League continues with night three in Glasgow where the victor in Berlin, MVG, meets Peter Wright before Gerwyn Price and Luke Littler complete the quarter-finals. (15.02).

programme.title: Live NCAA Basketball
programme.desc: More NCAA men's college basketball action from the Watsco Center as the Duke Blue Devils arrive to take on the Miami Hurricanes. (22.02).

programme.title: PGA Tour Champions Highlights
programme.desc: The 2024 PGA Tour Champions season continues with the Chubb Classic. Bernhard Langer is the back-to-back reigning champion here.

programme.title: PGA Tour: The Cut
programme.desc: A look behind the scenes of the PGA Tour. Follow the world's best players as they prepare for the big events in 2024.

programme.title: PGA Tour Champions Learning Centre
programme.desc: From instruction tips for your game, to fitness advice and lifestyle lessons, hear from the best on the circuit in PGA Tour Champions Learning Centre.

programme.title: F1 2023 Season Review
programme.desc: As another chapter in F1 closes, take a look back at 2023 with the Sky Sports F1 team.

programme.title: Foreman v Cooney 1990
programme.desc: Watch the iconic crossroads battle between aging heavyweights George Foreman and Gerry Cooney in a billing known as 'The Preacher and The Puncher'.

programme.title: How The 2012 ICC T20 WC Was Won
programme.desc: As it happened, this was the story of the 2012 ICC World Twenty20 held in Sri Lanka - a tournament ultimately won by the West Indies.

programme.title: Ladies European Tour Golf Hlts
programme.desc: Tournament highlights from the the Aramco Saudi Ladies International Presented by PIF in Riyadh. Lydia Ko triumphed for the second time here in 2023.

programme.title: ICC Men's T20 WC 2022: ENG v SL
programme.desc: The stage is set at the SCG for England to catapult themselves into the ICC Men's T20 World Cup semi-final. In their way stand Sri Lanka as Jos Buttler's men target a famous win. (05.11).

programme.title: U.S. F1 Sprint
programme.desc: The 2023 United States Grand Prix sees the fifth F1 Sprint this season. Putting Friday behind him, Max Verstappen starts from P1 with Charles Leclerc and Lewis Hamilton behind. (21.10).

programme.title: Live African Amateur Championship
programme.desc: Day two of the 2024 African Amateur Championship, held at Leopard Creek, South Africa. Featuring 72 men, the winner here will receive exemption for The 152nd Open at Royal Troon. (22.02).

programme.desc: Enjoy the greatest Premier League game for each of the league's 49 clubs, as voted for by fans. Here, for Middlesbrough, the 8-1 hammering of Man City back in May 2008.

programme.title: PL Greatest:Sheff Weds/N Forest 95
programme.desc: Enjoy the greatest Premier League game for the league's 47 clubs, as voted for by fans. For Nottingham Forest, the 7-1 win at Sheffield Wednesday back in the 1994-95 season.

programme.sub-title: Live: Porto v Arsenal ║ Sport ║ S2023E148 ║ Subs
programme.desc: FC Porto v Arsenal (Kick-off 8.00pm). Coverage of the last-16 first-leg tie from Estadio do Dragao. The visitors easily made it through to this stage after finishing top of Group B, finishing with 13 points ahead of PSV, Lens and Sevilla. The hosts progressed out of their group by finishing second behind Barcelona despite ending on the same amount of points, losing out on top spot thanks to their head-to-head record against the Spaniards.
